Ningxia Petrochemical 45/80 Fertilizer Project

July 10, 2011, China Petroleum Ningxia Petrochemical Company with an annual output of 450,000 tons of synthetic ammonia, 800,000 tons of urea project started construction in Yinchuan, the project construction is 100% localization, independent development and self-construction. Ningxia Petrochemical and Huanqiu engineering company are in close collaboration and they are committed to scientific and technological research and development, so far they has completed the synthesis of ammonia and urea package technology package. The project is located in Wenchang South Road, Xixia District, Yinchuan City, with a total area of about 27 hectares, estimated total investment of 2.522 billion yuan, is expected to put into operation in the first half of 2013.

As the general contractor for the laboratory PKchem provides on-site technical services, that is, laboratory equipment installation, commissioning, training. It has included the installation of furniture, analytical equipment, commissioning and training work. Large equipment such as gas chromatography, atomic absorption instrument and so on.
